item.title: Future energy storage and distribution
item.description: It is no longer a secret, nor a great insight, that we are in a revolutionary era in terms of the energy industry. Many technologies , greener and cheaper are implemented , a lot of assets we uses are being electrified (EV’s , heating solution) and more and energy , in general becomes more of commodity than an production resource. With that development, new challenges and limitations arise and create risks for industrial, commercial, and residential uses and processes.
